cross-os-testing.name: Cross-OS Testing
cross-os-testing.description: Test across multiple operating systems (Ubuntu, Windows, macOS)

template.yaml:
strategy:
  matrix:
    os:
      - ubuntu-latest
      - windows-latest
      - macos-latest

paths-ignore.name: Paths Ignore
paths-ignore.description: Skip CI runs for documentation-only changes

dependency-caching.name: Dependency Caching
dependency-caching.description: Cache dependencies to speed up builds

template.yaml:
- uses: actions/cache@v4
  with:
    path: ~/.npm
    key: ${{ runner.os }}-node-${{ hashFiles('**/package-lock.json') }}
    restore-keys: |
      ${{ runner.os }}-node-

dependency-audit.name: Dependency Audit
dependency-audit.description: Scan for security vulnerabilities in dependencies

template.yaml:
- name: Audit dependencies
  run: npm audit --audit-level=moderate

deploy-on-tag.name: Deploy on Tag
deploy-on-tag.description: Trigger deployment when version tags are pushed

codeql-analysis.name: CodeQL Analysis
codeql-analysis.description: GitHub security scanning for code vulnerabilities

template.yaml:
- uses: github/codeql-action/init@v3
  with:
    languages: ${{ matrix.language }}
- uses: github/codeql-action/analyze@v3

coverage-upload.name: Coverage Upload
coverage-upload.description: Upload test coverage to Codecov or Coveralls

template.yaml:
- uses: codecov/codecov-action@v4
  with:
    token: ${{ secrets.CODECOV_TOKEN }}
    fail_ci_if_error: false

- name: Lint commit messages
  uses: wagoid/commitlint-github-action@v5

stale-cleanup.name: Stale Issue Cleanup
stale-cleanup.description: Automatically close inactive issues and PRs

template.yaml:
- uses: actions/stale@v9
  with:
    stale-issue-message: 'This issue has been automatically marked as stale.'
    days-before-stale: 60
    days-before-close: 7
